website_summaries.verdict: With a range of up to 500 feet, this pager transmits upstairs, downstairs, across apartment complexes and through brick walls.
pros: Range of up to 500 feet in an open area
Wear call button as a pendant, carry it on your pocket or place it bedside
Receiver is portable or wall mountable
Multiple receiver options to eliminate interference from other devices
Can reach across multiple floors or apartments
cons: No batteries included, and it needs 3 AAA's and a CR 2032 to run

customer_reviews.title: Love this product
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! It works from across the street. It gives my family a sense of security that I can raise an alarm immediately if I am in danger or injured. They also like choosing what the alarm sounds like. There are quite a few choices, and it is loud enough that they can't miss it. It brings wonderful peace of mind. Great for family member who needs a little independence but might need to call for help quickly too. This will also get a signal through when phone lines and cell towers are down.
customer_reviews.author: MWH

customer_reviews.title: Pefect call button!!!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough about this product! This was exactly what we were looking for! We needed a way for my Grandmother to summon her caregiver when she needs assistance, day or night, and this works perfectly! It has various volume settings and many sound options. It is definitely loud enough to wake anyone up during the night and has great range. We purchased this model because it includes the batteries, which saved us time!
customer_reviews.author: SMCA

customer_reviews.title: Wireless Remote Nurse Alert System that now failed at a critical time
customer_reviews.text: On this morning my wife had an incident and tried to use the alarm by pressing the Alarm Button and nothing worked - it was a serious incident but I just happened to be checking on her an hour later. I replaced all the batteries in the Alarm element and both before and after the test noise-alarm and light worked but the alarm button was not being read - so now i want to return it and find another one better and more reliable
customer_reviews.author: Richard Pawloski

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Took awhile to figure out all the buttons and options. Don't know why these kind of products can't be made 10 times simpler to use. Does serve its purpose though and works very well as a wireless alert system. Have been using this button perhaps 10 times per day for almost two months and the batteries are still good...with both units on constantly, 24/7. Another nice thing about this product, it uses easily obtainable batteries. Many similar caregiver devices use strange battery sizes. Why?!! Do engineers and designers not know that caregivers do not have time to find and chase down obscure battery types for replacement! Anyway this product works and is reasonably priced. I bought a second set.
customer_reviews.author: MikeS

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful tool if you care for an elderly person
customer_reviews.text: I help care for my father. Since he is not as sturdy on his feet as he used to be, he requires a lot of assistance. This product has been so helpful during those moments when we can’t be right by his side at home 24/7. When he needs assistance, he presses the button and the alarm chimes. It is very handy. The company that sells this was so helpful too! The battery cover broke and it made the product pretty useless as the batteries kept popping out. I reached out to them and they sent me a new cover right away! Now that’s a great way to do business.
customer_reviews.author: ME-S.D.

customer_reviews.title: Everything I hoped for
customer_reviews.text: These call buttons are great. I have my 94 year old father living with me and purchased these so when he needs help, I would know it. I have a large property and I had my father ride his mobility scooter around different parts of it and activate the call button. From every location, both inside of the house and on the property I picked up his alert. I should have purchased these a long time ago. Do I recommend these.... I sure do.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: My elderly parent has had 2 serious falls in less than 6 months. If you are not quick when he calls for bathroom assistance at night, he gets up anyway. We have not missed a night call since this came. The call button is easy for him to find and press at night. You can set the volume on the caregiver pager to wake up almost any sleeper. The short battery life of the pager was mentioned in several reviews. We only need this at night, so we have been taking one of the batteries loose each morning.
customer_reviews.author: Jody

customer_reviews.title: The description isbetterthan the product.
customer_reviews.text: Te description of the product met my needs perfectly. When I received the product and put batteries into all the parts it worked great...for two days. If the description was a selling point, quality manufacturing wasn't. I returned the product, but unfortunately they refunded it rather than replace it. I need a quality product that keeps working.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hinrichs

customer_reviews.title: Works Great with a choice of alert sounds and volume control.
customer_reviews.text: Love this Alarm/Alert Device! My mother uses it downstairs and I have the receiver upstairs (where I sleep). I like the variety of alert sounds and the ability to adjust the loudness. I only wish it would have shipped with the cell battery (even if it cost a few dollars more). I always have regular batteries on hand, but had to make a special trip to the store for the cell battery.
customer_reviews.author: Zenzi Zang

customer_reviews.title: Does what it is supposed to do at a very good price.
customer_reviews.text: This is something that should be in most homes. It works perfectly and allows a caregiver to work on housework while their spouse is in bed sick with whatever illness. Our bedroom is upstairs and is fairly remote. Recently my wife was ill with flu and could not get me to come and help her when she got worse. This item will solve that problem. I gave it five stars because it works just as advertised at a very low price. Replacing the battery in the button is slightly tricky. But doable by a 73 year old man. It does not come with batteries and you will need a 2032 button battery plus 3 AAA batteries.
customer_reviews.author: amxcoder

customer_reviews.title: Nurse Alert System is easy to hear even from another room
customer_reviews.text: This was a convenient way to be able to have someone alert you if there is a problem without the expense of other systems. It works well and the sounds it emits are loud enough to hear in different rooms of the house or it is small enough to carry it with you and the alert button itself comes with a strap to put over your neck.
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Did not work properly since purchased.
customer_reviews.text: We replaced the battery (at $6 each) three times in two months because it would stop working every few weeks. We replaced the battery today, again, and it still does not work. It seems to have been defective since day one. Now it is past the return date and we have to purchase a new one for my mother.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Red flashing light will not turn off
customer_reviews.text: Everything fine except receiver too large and if you put it in your pocket the buttons depress too easily and sound is going off. Have ordered two of these and after a time after being activated the red flashing light will not turn off even after removing and reinstalling the batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customerjeffreyjg

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My husband has Ménière Disease and “drop vertigo attacks” can happen at any time. He lets me know when he’s going outside and I put the base in the room with me. If he’s having a bad vertigo day he wears it inside in case he falls. I was looking into life line until a friend recommended this. Its awesome. Give me a peace of mind and my hubby doesn’t get scared of going out side.
customer_reviews.author: KelliH

customer_reviews.title: Super Easy!
customer_reviews.text: This product was used in my home to care for my disabled mother. It literally took 2 minutes to set up and worked like a charm. The wearable alarm is easy for her to use and the alarm resounds through our large home, no matter where in the house I am. The multiple alarm fobs are also helpful, letting me leave one in various areas in the home she might venture while not wearing her alarm. This has been a real life safer for her and gives me much needed peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: M.Smith

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: These things are okay but they can get better if they'll have to put a sounds of peeping it will be very useful but I just time it's not useful for me I need to say that or dislike for my house multiple people cannot use it because it's the same sound like I said I'll be nice if they would have a different beeping for each model
customer_reviews.author: Monica Moldovan

customer_reviews.title: Needed Comunication
customer_reviews.text: My shop is a few hundred feet from my house. My wife has dementia so she may need to let me know I am needed at the house. This works great even inside the steel building. I have had to pair it again if not used for some time but that is simple. It also works around the house, of course. She knows if she pushes the button I will be there fast.
customer_reviews.author: David_De

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS A MUST FOR A OLDER OR DISABLED PERSON
customer_reviews.text: GOT THIS FOR MY MOM, WHEN SHE NEEDED SOMETHING SHE GOT WELL AND STILL USES IT JUST INCASE SHE FALLS . SHE DID AND PUSHED THE BUTTON WE RAN TO HER TO HELP USED A LOT AND YOU CAN HERE IT AND IT WORKED EVERY TIME A MUST ITEM FOR ANYONE SICK, OLD OR DISABLED
customer_reviews.author: CARCAT

customer_reviews.title: Works as Expected!
customer_reviews.text: I’m assuming batteries will last. Have only had it three days. It is exactly what I wanted. Flashing light, at least one tune that doesn’t annoy me. Mom loves the easy to find button. I spent hours looking at various call alerts with my sister and reading several articles reviewing different ones. This one fits the bill. Price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Silverlocks

customer_reviews.title: Nice range and choice of tones
customer_reviews.text: This comes with two call buttons and one receiver that can get very loud. You also have the option of muting the device with just a light blinking to alert you of the call. Overall, good range, good design, and lots of tones to choose from.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Very useful
customer_reviews.text: My wife recently fell breaking several bones. We live in a large house and she was having difficulty calling for help (I'm parentally deaf). Now, she just pushes a button when she needs me.
customer_reviews.author: twbowling

customer_reviews.title: Great for elderly parent
customer_reviews.text: Took this on vacation with my elderly Mother. I felt very confident about her sleeping in another part of the house. Easy to use. I’m going to use it to get my husband’s attention the next time I’m sick.
customer_reviews.author: Ginspice

customer_reviews.title: Love this! I am taking care of my mom ...
customer_reviews.text: Love this! I am taking care of my mom 24/7 who is chair bound. I was so nervous with sleepless nights thinking and hearing she was calling me when she WASN'T. Since the arrival of thhi product, I have slept in peace without any issues. When she needs me she presses the button (where ever she is at in the home) and I hear the sounds I choose to hear (many choices) with choice of volume (I have the main receiver box with me at all times). Great product! I 100% recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: no on

customer_reviews.title: The only problem I can see is that the button is very easy to hit and call the caregiver
customer_reviews.text: Works as stated. The only problem I can see is that the button is very easy to hit and call the caregiver. My Mom accidentally hit the button and it went off. I think it should be a little more "reset" instead of so high up so it would be a little more difficult to push accidentally. Other than that, works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Debra

customer_reviews.title: Just a GREAT PRODUCT for a home care services.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the reason that it was designed. The volume for the signal would wake the dead, which is very good. The pendant is water resistant and does not require any effort to activate.
customer_reviews.author: john

customer_reviews.title: Where’s grandmal, just go to the sound....
customer_reviews.text: Slapped this on grandmal, now we know when she goes down. JK, great product, haven’t had to use it thank god....
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J.

customer_reviews.title: I got what I paid for.
customer_reviews.text: I liked everything about it. Although I haven't had the need to use it yet, just the comfort of knowing it's available. My wife is ill and we sleep in separate rooms. This device will alert me if she has a fall or is in distress.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Marchione

customer_reviews.title: This product is a godsend!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to enable my elderly mother to ring for help when I'm in any other room. Works perfectly! Easy to set up and use, I can adjust the volume and pick from a large selection of musical or alarm tones, and the wireless receiver unit comes with me wherever I am in the house. The alarm comes from the receiver unit only, so it doesn't freak Mom out. TOTALLY WORTH the very reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Catherine Linnett

customer_reviews.title: In some situations like my own
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but I wish they offered more bases, for one button. They offer numerous buttons per base. In some situations like my own, I could benefit from the opposite. My husband works from home, so we keep it there, but my son has an office quite far away in the basement and when my husband is not home, they often forget to hand over the base, thus it's not doing me any good if no one can hear it.
customer_reviews.author: LAM

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: I Purchased the system as a gift and it work as described! They were purchased for a friend’s elderly mother and he said they are exactly needed!
customer_reviews.author: Rico

customer_reviews.title: A must for an elderly parent.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my mother. She has a tendency to fall so we got it for her to wear around the house so we can hear if she falls. Its very loud and can be heard from 50 feet away clearly.
customer_reviews.author: Big Mike

customer_reviews.title: I like the different tones/songs you can choose
customer_reviews.text: This pager has been a life saver! It was so affordable I assumed it would stop working. We use it multiple times a day for the last month with no issues. I like the different tones/songs you can choose, and I can adjust the volume so I do not wake my husband when I have to get up in the middle of the night to care for my mother. She wears it in the shower. If I go outside to get the mail or to my car to get something I still get reception. So, I know when my mother needs help. This a great option for a home caregiver. Thank you for making such a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective...
customer_reviews.text: Just took delivery of product today but receiver alarm will not pair with call button transmitter. Have done everything as per instructions and even reset the unit by holding Sound and Volume buttons simultaneously but no success. Unit is defective and will have to be sent back.
customer_reviews.author: T. Eimon

customer_reviews.title: I like the continuing sound...til it is turned off.
customer_reviews.text: The button is easy for my husband to use. He loves it! His previous pager became to hard for him to push. I like that there are sound and volume options as the listener. The cord looks nice...but is a little slick for him to get a hold of. But he has trouble holding small, thin item. For a person with normal finger dexterity, it most likely works great. I like that the sound continues until you turn it off. On our old one...if I didn't hear it the first time...he would have to keep trying to push the button to get help.
customer_reviews.author: Linda G.

customer_reviews.title: A Great Value for the Price
customer_reviews.text: This Alert System works perfectly for my bedridden mom to alert me when I'm in another part of the house.
customer_reviews.author: CJB

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my aging parents and it’s wonderful! They love it! Works great and they can hear it and they’re hard of hearing.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Annoying sounds but does a good job
customer_reviews.text: This worked to go from the 2nd floor to the 1st floor clear on the other end of the house. I was impressed by the range. I was less impressed by the selection of sounds -- they were electronic, tinny, and pretty horrible. We finally found one that was OK. This is very functional and worked as designed.
customer_reviews.author: Diana G.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Worked when I was caring for my terminally ill sister. I kept the monitor with me and she could effectively call me when she needed me. You could make it as loud or as noxious as you needed to make sure to be heard. It worked through the thick walls in a pre-war NY building.
customer_reviews.author: Babbbs

customer_reviews.title: Nice system
customer_reviews.text: Nice system. It would help if they provide the first battery. When you order this type of product- sometimes you need to use it immediately such as for a hospice patient, you can’t leave them to run to a store. Or if you live in a remote area
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Best Alert for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Now this is a very useful gadget. Home care for family members can be a trial if you doze off and they need help. Just pushing the button on the alert starts the receiving unit to make a noise that isn't easily mistaken. This device gives the patient a more secure feeling that they can get help right away. The range of this device is easily 500 feet and works from inside the home to out in the yard.
customer_reviews.author: Everitt W. Mace

customer_reviews.title: Nice feature! I was surprised that little red flashing ...
customer_reviews.text: This worked so well at home that I bought one for our vacation home too. Many different sounds for the alarm and different levels for volume. During the night the light started to flash on it. I wasn't sure what was happening. Turns out it was warning me that the battery was going dead. Nice feature! I was surprised that little red flashing light woke me.
customer_reviews.author: Donna M Miller

customer_reviews.title: Secure@Wireless Remote
customer_reviews.text: Works well in our situation. We like the choice of alert tones, and the fact it can be heard anywhere in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta Shawver

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Solution
customer_reviews.text: My husband has Parkinson's and his voice has gotten softer and softer. He also struggles with small items. This lets him get my attention when he needs help. I am really pleased with the distance the signal reaches. I can work in the yard or leave it at my son's house next door when I have to run errands. I know he is being monitored continuously and can get help when he needs it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: My parents needed a wireless remote nursing system and this has worked out wonderfully for them. The fact that is the alerts are actually pleasant to the ear instead of jarring and alarming (pun intended) is a good feature. Although a belt clip would be a nice addition, its easy enough to carry around much like a thick phone.
customer_reviews.author: Michael K

customer_reviews.title: need to get 2 differeent sizes batteries.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the product, change the batteries and no more sound, guess you get what you pay for!!
customer_reviews.author: Lady magdelene

customer_reviews.title: So far great product
customer_reviews.text: Has many sounds to pick from and different volume settings. I can hear the loudest setting clear across my house.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Easy and practical
customer_reviews.text: Took 5 min to set up. Now Dad sleeps without feeling isolated and I don’t have to wonder at every sound if he is ok.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Super handy! Works great long distances.
customer_reviews.text: This alarm is super helpful! I have it tied to my grandmother's walker. When she needs to get up at night to use the restroom and/or when she's finished, she can easily page me. The highest volume can easily be heard throughout the house without any need to carry the pager around in my pocket. This has been super helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Arizona Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love that this does not require electricity. We also like the variety of alarms sounds that are available.
customer_reviews.author: PLP

customer_reviews.title: Hairline Trigger
customer_reviews.text: In 10 days of use I received 3 false alarms. It has a hairline trigger. I really didn't appreciate getting awoken in the middle of the night twice because my Mom rolled over in her sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Ridge Ryerson

customer_reviews.title: Loud and works like a champ!
customer_reviews.text: I got this so that my 88 year old infirmed mother could call for help anytime she needs us. It is loud and works like a champ. I am so glad that I purchased this. It has really made a difference. Loud enough to get your attention in sleep or from across the house or yard.
customer_reviews.author: Keoni

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Using 3 receivers and 4 transmitters. Setup was quick and easy. Works from one end of the house to the other and upstairs and downstairs. 1100sq ft 2 story house.
customer_reviews.author: Camera Man

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect for our needs !
customer_reviews.text: My husband is now unable to speak and has very minimal use of his hands/arms. He needed a way to call for me when assistance was needed. He is able to push the large red button, which in turn alerts my part of the system, set to music. Day or night he knows he can get me by pushing the red button. This inexpensive system works perfect for us and we would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Linda W. Moore

customer_reviews.title: It worked
customer_reviews.text: Well the screw driver and screw on the controller is stripped, past that works and loud
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Dotson

customer_reviews.title: Batteries NOT included
customer_reviews.text: Read the product description carefully. Batteries are not included, the statement in the product description could be made more clear. I don't mind if AA or AAA are missing as most people will probably have them at home but CR2032, one per receiver, is another story.
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: Good for elderly or temporarily incapacitated
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my mother who needs extra help getting around now. She and my father really like the choice of tones this has for getting attention when help is needed. The button is not too bulky, so can be worn around the neck without a problem, which is what she does so that it is always nearby, within reach.
customer_reviews.author: K. KingTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: but not bad at all
customer_reviews.text: Works well. The base is about twice as thick as a phone so it's a bit clunky to carry, but not bad at all. Good product. Excellent range
customer_reviews.author: Riles

customer_reviews.title: Works too good - be carefull what you wish for :)
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write a review until my parents had a chance to use it for a while. It works GREAT! My dad can go out in the front garden (about 50' away) to hoe and it still reaches inside the house fine. My mom hates it though, becasue now he uses it for any little thing. Once the alarm sounds, it doesn't turn off until manually reset. Good for emergencies, not so good for frequent requests...
customer_reviews.author: HirschiKisses

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Crap. Doesn’t work. I sent mine back. Total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lance Langdon

customer_reviews.title: This has saved me from having to constantly go up ...
customer_reviews.text: This has saved me from having to constantly go up and down the steps to check on my Dad. Now, he can get my attention any time he needs something. We use this in addition to a video monitor. He is more familiar with a "nurse call button," having been recently hospitalized, so there was no learning curve to use this device.
customer_reviews.author: Doris B.

customer_reviews.title: Functions well.  Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. One end of house to other no problem with reception. Button big and easy to push. Few false alarms when wearer rolls over on it. Has a ridiculous amount of alarm choices. 45! The people who put them in have a sense of humor. Was kinda fun trying to guess the tunes.
customer_reviews.author: Linday

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: Can not rerun this as already had it too long to return when we tried to use it (hospitalized much longer than expected). The sounds it made were horrible. Would not advise anyone to buy this! Plus we had to buy a watch battery and 3 AAA batteries. Over $15 wasted.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine R. Cronin

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect for my mom who is 93
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect for my mom who is 93. Put one in each room of the house. Luckily we have only had use once.
customer_reviews.author: MLJ

customer_reviews.title: ABSOLUTELY WONDERFUL call bell system for in home care
customer_reviews.text: ABSOLUTELY WONDERFUL call bell system for in home care! My mom has no trouble using this and it alerts me that she needs my help. It works anywhere in my home and I suspect it would work outside as well although I have yet to try it. I love that I can set the alert and there are many tones to choose from. Reasonably priced and perfect!
customer_reviews.author: B. Schuck

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My elderly family members feels confident using this when she needs assistance.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen

customer_reviews.title: Works good for elderly & is loud
customer_reviews.text: Super useful for nurses or even my family that has an elderly sleeping at the back of the house.easy to use and to set up. You will need two types of batteries (AAA & 2032). There’s so many songs/ alarms to choose from & it can be super loud if necessary
customer_reviews.author: OP

customer_reviews.title: This is a great device that he can use to let us know ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my dad, who has ALS, and can't speak or walk on his own. This is a great device that he can use to let us know when he is ready to get up from a nap, is done using the restroom, etc. It's hard to find devices that will help out people who don't have the capability of speaking and have limited physical abilities and this one does exactly what we need it to. It has given us a peace of mind! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: VGravelle

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this little guy
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this little guy. It works very well for our family. It even works indoor out doors. Not sure about the range at this point. A large verity of sounds and tunes to choose from. We have been using it for 3 months now on the first set of batteries.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Parton

customer_reviews.title: It is great!
customer_reviews.text: It works great! We are using it for an elderly resident in our home. The button is pinned to the bed but can be worn around the neck if needed. We have used it both ways. The alarm has a good range for when we are outside. Eases our worries.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer. BJD

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Mom saver in an emergency it reaches from her house on our property to mine peace of mind big time
customer_reviews.author: tarpaperhaven

customer_reviews.title: Chinese garbage
customer_reviews.text: I bought one and it died in two days. I bought another one and it was junk on delivery. Typical Chinese garbage. Save yourself the hassle and don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Consumer

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when I had surgery. It works just as it says it does and was worth the money. I highly recommend this product. It worked throughout a 1400 sq ft home and into the yard. Very helpful!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Useless piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Useless piece of crap!! Stopped working within a week. I did not bother returning since I had given it to my grandmother who lives in another country. Threw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Dhingra

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: A great product for caregiver, I can go to my workshop, into yard, etc. without worrying about patient needing care. The push button works very easy, not hard to push like some of them. Push button is light and easy to wear. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ray H

customer_reviews.title: Perfect alarm system
customer_reviews.text: The product was exactly what I needed for medical alert situation I am involved with. Works perfect. A special thanks to Personal Safety Corporation for helping me resolve the delivery issue with UPS.
customer_reviews.author: Jim G.

customer_reviews.title: his care-giver however was kind of annoyed by the too frequent buzzes 😊
customer_reviews.text: I bought this device for a handicapped distant relative, and had it delivered directly to him. My relative’s feedback was very positive, his care-giver however was kind of annoyed by the too frequent buzzes 😊
customer_reviews.author: Andre B.

customer_reviews.title: but would be nice if a belt clip came with
customer_reviews.text: Works very well so far. Haven't tried it for much distance yet. I feel the receiver is rather large to put in your pocket though. I did rig it up so I could clip it to my belt loop, but would be nice if a belt clip came with....the button is large and easy to push for my mother who has dimentia and severe arthritis in her hands.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Miller

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time and money.
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your time and money. Great idea. Great range. System worked for six weeks. But even while working,we had to change the three AAA batteries in the receiver every five days. We were going to look for another option anyway but now we are forced to. When we install new batteries, they become extremely hot to the touch and the system no longer works. Just to make sure, we tried three more batteries with the same result.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Remote stopped working and its not the batteries
customer_reviews.text: Remote control has stopped working. Don't see a way to contact seller for replacement. Replaced batteries and still dont work. This did not hold up long at all and with little use. This product is great if the remote would still be working.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Dependable
customer_reviews.text: It did the job, but I thought the catalog of various chimes was a bit goofy. Guess I am old school.
customer_reviews.author: E. Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Met our needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: it freed me to go about the business of my day without worrying about my husband and wondering if he needed/wanted something. He had the buzzer and I had my peace of mind. I no longer felt that I had to "hover and smother" and that pleased him too.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie A

customer_reviews.title: ... stairs to get my attention so far this is perfect for what we needed
customer_reviews.text: But this so my parents could let me know that they wanted to talk to me I live upstairs and they were tired of yelling up the stairs to get my attention so far this is perfect for what we needed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT !!!!
customer_reviews.text: This alert system exceeded my expectations. I now have the freedom to go anywhere inside or outside of the house knowing that my handicapped husband can let me know if he needs help. I took the receiver inside my sons house, which is at least 500' from mine, and it still worked.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: This has worked great for my husband. He can call me when needed. has a good sound and loud enough to hear from a deep sleep. Also works when i am outside weeding.Great price also
customer_reviews.author: Bern

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Put in detached garage to call the hubby from the house. Works great but I wish it had a sound control button for a louder sound.
customer_reviews.author: SoBelleMaggie

customer_reviews.title: I was very surprise how far the you can be ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprise how far the you can be and still set the alarm off, I decided to test the product by hitting the button while being outside the house and probably had 7 walls in between the remote and receiver and it still went off without any delay or issues.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Really nice call button
customer_reviews.text: This button box is great for my mom to call me. I can hear any one a many tones from anywhere in m y house, even ffrom in the garage
customer_reviews.author: Charles A

customer_reviews.title: A Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: This is great for anyone who physicallly May fall, or already has, and needs to alert someone when they need help. They are for live-in caregivers only as the signal only reaches 500 ft. I love it & it is very affordable.
customer_reviews.author: LDB

customer_reviews.title: It is the best buy ever
customer_reviews.text: I have never left a review for a product!! Ever!! I would have paid a huge amount more for this pager to get the critical functionality. It is the best buy ever!! Make sure you have the two types of not-included batteries (3x AAA batteries, 1x CR2032 battery) so you have them when you sit down to assemble it. If I were you, I'd assume this review was done by the company. I promise that it isn't.
customer_reviews.author: wallaua

customer_reviews.title: ... mother came to live with us and it is great! She is in the basement apartment and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this button when my elderly mother came to live with us and it is great! She is in the basement apartment and I here it perfectly in my 2nd floor bedroom. I keep the unit at the head of the stairs on the second floor so wherever I am in the house I can hear it go off. I do take it in the bathroom when I shower just in case the water is too loud to hear the button. Using for about 9 months now with no problem. And it was pretty cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: It works perfect for my office
customer_reviews.text: It works perfect for my office. When I leave the patient in the room, I now have a comfort level that they can buzz me if they need. The transponder is a little big but its nice to change the volume and signal sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: You need to feed it 3 AAA batteries every day. No option to use a charger.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Syed J. Hashmi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my daughter with epilepsy
customer_reviews.text: We keep this by her bed. Either myself or my husband is by her side. If she starts having a seizure, we can press this button and it chimes in the middle of the house. That lets the other know to RUN into the room. We can stay calm and cool in front of the child and immediately alert the other parent of a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Mom and writer

customer_reviews.title: Call Alert System
customer_reviews.text: The Call Alert System is working very well and has saved me a lot of time running back and forth when not needed to check on my Mother. I can now go anywhere in the house and know that if she needs something she is just a "call button" away from finding me. The only thing that I wish it would have done is to be able to talk with it - just to say I am on my way to help. It is used day and night and I would highly recommend this to anyone that is taking care of a patient that cannot get up and down without help and/or not mobile. Thank you. Kay Tadin.
customer_reviews.author: KMT

customer_reviews.title: Ideal fit for us...but quit working in 4 days
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived when promised, was very easy to set up and use. Unfortunately it stopped working after 4 days, tried replacing the batteries to no avail. It had to be returned and a new device found and bought locally.
customer_reviews.author: Timmay

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Works very well. When I am in deep sleep it jolts me awake. It works at great distance too. My neighbor tested it, he lives across the street from us and he went inside his house and it worked. Great for anyone who is taking care of someone disabled.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: It really does have 500 ft range
customer_reviews.text: Love this item. It is perfect for my Dad that is in rehab at my home. Unable to call out for help...it's comforting for him (and family) to know he can summon help instantly.
customer_reviews.author: Linda oliver

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we needed. a simple device to alert a caregiver for my handicapped wife.
customer_reviews.author: Valinda Claire Kane

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic For the Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product! I had low expectations for this at the price they were asking compared to other related products. I was shocked! It worked vastly better than expected. I am getting easily 200+ feet range indoors through walls. Compared to other products out there, this is the one to get based on quality, range and of course price.
customer_reviews.author: RedR

customer_reviews.title: Works great for us
customer_reviews.text: This works great. With 2 call buttons I put one on each side of my dad's hospital bed so when he wakes up in the middle of the night he can find one easily. I like that it has a volume level and different sounds.
customer_reviews.author: F. Williams

product_meta.title: Secure SWCB-1 Wireless Remote Nurse Alert System - SOS Help Pendant Call Button and Caregiver Pager Kit - 500+ Ft Range … (1 Transmitter Set)
product_meta.description:
Size:1 Transmitter SetThe Secure Wireless Remote Nurse Alert Call Button System for patient and caregiver is simple to use and provides piece of mind. Ideal for use as an alert aid for elderly or disabled to quickly and easily call for help. Simply press the call button to alert the caregiver via the wireless receiver. Includes 1x Nurse Call Button, 1x Caregiver Receiver, and screwdriver to install call button batteries. (Requires 3x AAA batteries, 1x CR2032 battery) 

The Secure Wireless Remote Nurse Alert System is backed by the exclusive Personal Safety Corporation one year full-replacement warranty and exceptional customer service! Don't be fooled by the imitators; Trust in a brand that has been serving concerned care facilities and individuals since 1991! 

All Secure Call Button Alert systems are FCC compliant, unlike nearly all similar call button systems available. 

PSC is devoted to being your Patient-Centered, Solutions-Based, Cost-Effective partner for ALL your fall management and patient safety product needs. Our vision is to listen, learn and lead the industry in developing the highest quality products at the lowest manufacturer direct prices. We pride ourselves on focusing our complete attention on exceeding the expectations of our valued customers with the industry’s most complete line of high quality fall management and patient safety products. 

Our products have assisted in reducing falls in thousands of nursing homes and hospitals throughout the U.S., Canada and Europe. 

PAIRING INSTRUCTIONS: 

1. Press receiver “Signal” button until LED light turns on 
2. Press red call button once to pair with receiver 
3. Red light will flash to confirm successful pairing 
4. Receiver will automatically exit pairing mode 
5. System is ready to use. Repeat process if call button and receiver lose connection
feature_bullets: Our wireless nurse call button alert system for patient and caregiver is simple to use and provides piece of mind - Ideal for use as an alert aid for elderly or disabled to quickly and easily call for help - Simply press the call button to alert the caregiver via the wireless receiver
System range of up to 500+ ft in open area - 32 melody/alarm sounds to choose from, adjustable volume control, and multiple receiving options to eliminate interference from other devices
Call button can be worn as a pendant, carried on pocket, or placed at bedside - Call button is water resistant - Receiver can be wall mounted, placed near caregiver, or carried in pocket
All Secure Call Button Alert systems are FCC compliant, unlike nearly all similar call button systems available

Inludes 1x Patient Call Button, 1x Caregiver Reciever, and screwdriver to install call button battery (requires 3x AAA batteries, 1x CR2032 battery) - Backed by the Personal Safety Corporation one year full-replacement warranty and exceptional customer service - Trust in a company that has been serving thousands of long term care facilities and hospitals since 1991
